mdl.redcap¶

@purpose: Downloading data from REDCap.
@date: Created on Sat May 1 15:12:38 2019
@author: Semeon Risom
@email: semeon.risom@gmail.com
@url: https://semeon.io/R33-analysis
class mdl.redcap.redcap[source]¶

Downloading data from REDCap.

Methods

cesd(path, token, url, report_id) Download CES-D data for use in analysis.
demographics(path, token, url, report_id[, …]) Download demographics data for use in analysis.
mmpi(path, token, url, report_id[, payload]) Download MMPI data for use in analysis.
cesd(path, token, url, report_id)[source]¶

Download CES-D data for use in analysis.

Parameters:
path : str

Path to save data.

token : str

API token to REDCap project.

url : str

API URL to REDCap server.

report_id : int

Name of report to export.

payload : dict or None

Parameters for type of download from REDCap.
demographics(path, token, url, report_id, payload=None)[source]¶

Download demographics data for use in analysis.

Parameters:
path : str

Path to save data.

token : str

API token to REDCap project.

url : str

API URL to REDCap server.

report_id : int

Name of report to export.

payload : dict or None

Parameters for type of download from REDCap.

Notes

color = [‘Light Gray’, ‘Gray’, ‘Light Blue’, ‘Blue’ ‘Violet’, ‘Blue-Green’, ‘Green’, ‘Amber’,
‘Hazel’, ‘Light Brown’, ‘Dark Brown’, ‘Black’, ‘Other’]

Download MMPI data for use in analysis.

Parameters:
path : str

Path to save data.

token : str

API token to REDCap project.

url : str

API URL to REDCap server.

report_id : int

Name of report to export.

payload : dict or None

Parameters for type of download from REDCap.
